name: Gifter
description:
"Gifter" a game made by TheNewTimeGamer

Run the "gifter.jar" to start the game.

The game requires java to be installed.

Art from: Opengameart.org

WASD and/or arrow keys to move.
Spacebar to drop presents.

Give all elves a present and avoid AA gun fire.

If the game runs poorly, I am sorry, zero effort has gone into optimizing this mess.
My advice would be to find the nearest super computer and try to run it on that.

Enjoy.
